service.desc: I always give a clean code to the consumer so the application is easy to understand and easy to develop.

services.desc: I am ready to start from scratch, or continue the ongoing projects. I always give innovative ideas to build the best applications.
I always give a clean code to the consumer so the application is easy to understand and easy to develop.
Tell your great app to me. Adjust your budget. And "BOOM", your app ready to published.
I will give you the best applications for your best ideas.

experience.desc: An activity program from Kampus Merdeka called Magang Studi Independen Bersertifikat in Collaboration with Hacktiv8. Participants are expected to be able to create a website based on a javascript framework and create a complex mobile application in the form of Android / iOS. Graduates of this program are expected to have the ability to work as Front End Developers and/or Mobile Apps

Virtual Moves Co is a startup company that has a vision to accommodate millennials to find job vacancies, my job is as a Frontend Developer which is responsible for producing lines of code that will become interactive User Interface
